node.html: I have 3+ years of experience as machine learning researcher and software developer. I am currently based in New Jersey, USA. I am currently working as a research intern at New York University, exploring facial age estimation and other biometric problems using Generative AI techniques. As a Senior Engineer at Samsung R&D, collaborating with CTO and Visual Intelligence teams, I specialized in building deep learning models for flagship devices, focusing on performance and resource efficiency. My academic journey at IIIT Hyderabad honed my skills in deep learning and fingerprint biometrics. Passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI, I bring a blend of innovative research and practical industry solutions to the table. I am currently open to work opportunities in the United States. If you have any interesting opportunities, please feel free to reach out! And if you want to meet the artist in me, hit me up on my Insta handle!

I graduated with an MS by Research in CSE from International Institute of Information Technology (IIIT Hyderabad), where I worked at the Center for Visual Information Technology (CVIT) under the mentorship of Dr. Anoop Namboodiri.

As a research intern at NYU Tandon School of Engineering, I am working on research projects related to face and fingerprint biometrics, using modern Generative AI and Language Modelling techniques, contributing to work aimed at peer-reviewed publications.

Previously, at Samsung R&D, I built and optimized AI models for tasks like object detection and classification, achieving significant performance improvements. My work utilized deep learning techniques, including transformers and diffusion models, for Samsung's flagship products.

My academic and research journey at CVIT lab honed my skills in fingerprint enhancement and robust representation learning, with notable achievements in enhancing fingerprint matching performance and optimizing search efficiency across large-scale datasets.

As part of the teaching team for the Foundations of Modern Machine Learning-2021 program by IHub-Data, IIIT Hyderabad, I had the opportunity to impart my knowledge to a diverse group of undergraduate students across India.

Here are a few technologies I've worked with:
• Conducting research on facial age estimation problems with a focus on modern generative AI and deep learning techniques, contributing to work aimed at peer-reviewed publications.

• Collaborated on the development and optimization of lightweight object detection models using transformers and diffusion models, achieving a 15% performance improvement for Samsung’s S23/S24 series.
  • Rapidly prototyped and implemented advanced classification models for Samsung’s AI Gallery application, resulting in a 30% performance enhancement.
  • Focused on practical AI and ML applications along with software development, demonstrating the impact of innovative research on commercial products.

• Focused fingerprint enhancement on low-quality synthetic and real fingerprint images using deep networks along with incorporating fingerprint domain knowledge. This boosted the fingerprint matching performance by 46%.
  • Pioneered a novel method for robust representation learning through self-supervised enhancement pre-training.
  • For large-scale similarity search, optimized and benchmarked indices in the Meta's Faiss library to achieve 9 queries per second, balancing time-accuracy trade-offs for efficient searching across a large-scale dataset of 45M vector samples and ensuring optimal performance through continuous resource monitoring.

• Collaborated with the professors and fellow researchers to prepare course content, design and evaluate projects and assignments for various course modules of the program Foundations of Modern Machine Learning-2021.
  • Conducted 45+ weekly labs, doubt-solving sessions, providing feedback and guidance to enhance the learning outcomes of 290+ students from various academic institutions across India.

• Designed, developed, and tested front-end modules for high-traffic bookings portal in Angular 6, enhancing user experience. Engineered and integrated robust RESTful APIs in Node.js within an Agile framework, improving data interchange and client service operations.
  • Tested Python APIs for advanced network solutions boosting network efficiency and reliability by 30%.

• Created interactive web and mobile simulations to illustrate data-mining experiments, contributing to the Virtual Labs project in collaboration with IIT Bombay, enhancing accessibility and understanding of complex data-mining concepts to machine learning beginners.

• CGPA: 8.83 / 10.00
  • Courses: Computer Vision, Statistical Methods in AI, Deep Learning-Theory and Practices, Digital Image Processing, Distributing Trust and Blockchains, Independent Study on Semi-supervised Continual Learning
  • Thesis: A Deep Learning Paradigm for Fingerprint Recognition: Harnessing U-Net Architecture for Fingerprint Enhancement and Representation Learning

• GPA: 3.99 / 4.00
  • Relevant Courses: C, C++, Data Structures, Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Data Mining, Databases, Java, Programming with R, Operating Systems, Object Oriented Programming, Software Engineering, Parallel Programming, Applied Mathematics, Computer Networks

frontmatter.title: Enhancement-Driven Pretraining for Robust Fingerprint Representation Learning

node.html: Introduced a self-supervised pre-training strategy based on enhancement method to learn robust fingerprint representations, boosting matching performance without the requirement of pristine or clean fingerprints.

frontmatter.title: Finger-UNet: A U-Net Based Multi- Task Architecture for Deep Fingerprint Enhancement

node.html: Enhanced low-quality fingerprint images using a modified U-Net architecture with wavelet attention and multi-task learning, incorporating fingerprint domain knowledge from minutia and orientation maps for improved recognition performance.

frontmatter.title: Center Loss Regularization for Continual Learning

node.html: Devised a regularization-based continual learning strategy leveraging center loss to avoid catastrophic forgetting. Our approach achieved competitive performance with the recent state-of-the-art techniques in continual domain adaptation scenarios and MNIST benchmarks.

frontmatter.title: Deep CNNs for Blood Cell           Classification

node.html: Applied transfer learning and ensemble methods on CNN models for Blood Cell Classification. Achieved state-of-the-art accuracy of 99.51%
In-depth analysis, review and presentation of research developments on semi-supervised continual learning topic as a part of Independent Study

Developed AI-based web application for medical diagnosis of 6 specific diseases based on clinical parameters obtained by various open-source medical datasets that include attributes from medical tests on user, predicting with more than 85% accuracy
Contributed a strategy and plugin for regularization-based continual learning approach Less-Forgetful Learning (LFL) to the open-source end-to-end continual learning library Avalanche by ContinualAI.

frontmatter.title: Games in P5.js - Flappy Bird (Neuroevolution), Tetris

node.html:
• Flappy Bird Game automated using Neuroevolution in p5.js
  • Basic Tetris Game implemented in p5.js

Studied and implemented a paper using ModelNet10 and Model40 datasets for 3D Object classification using Neural Networks, making it spatially invariant with voxel representation and 3D spatial transformer networks.

frontmatter.title: Identifying greenery, urban & water cover and visualizations

node.html: Identification of greenery, urban and water coverage on various sites in designated city using data collected from Google Street View API using image-processing techniques and visualize it on map.
Web-based animated and interactive demonstrations and self-evaluations to illustrate the basic and advanced concepts in Data-mining
Developed robust, scalable, fault-tolerant containerized distributed file storage system wherein a file is distributed across multiple nodes with several replicas using Java RMI, Networking, gRPC.
Built simplest versions of Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock and Battleship games with smart contracts to be deployed on Ethereum blockchain.
Whether you have a work opportunity for me or want to collaborate on a project or just want to say hi, feel free to hit me up!
